parameters.name: mask_type

param_schema.description: Mask type: binary (B&W), highlighted (colored overlay), or greenscreen

parameters.description: Mask type: binary (B&W), highlighted (colored overlay), or greenscreen

parameters.name: video_fps

param_schema.title: Video Fps
param_schema.description: Video output frame rate (ignored for image sequence)

parameters.description: Video output frame rate (ignored for image sequence)

parameters.name: click_frames

param_schema.title: Click Frames
param_schema.description: Frame indices for clicks as '0,0,150,0'. Auto-extends if shorter than coordinates.

parameters.description: Frame indices for clicks as '0,0,150,0'. Auto-extends if shorter than coordinates.

parameters.name: click_labels

param_schema.title: Click Labels
param_schema.description: Click types (1=foreground, 0=background) as '1,1,0,1'. Auto-extends if shorter than coordinates.

parameters.description: Click types (1=foreground, 0=background) as '1,1,0,1'. Auto-extends if shorter than coordinates.

parameters.name: output_video

param_schema.title: Output Video
param_schema.description: True for video output, False for image sequence

parameters.description: True for video output, False for image sequence

parameters.name: output_format

param_schema.description: Image format for sequence (ignored for video)

parameters.description: Image format for sequence (ignored for video)

parameters.name: output_quality

param_schema.title: Output Quality
param_schema.description: JPG/WebP compression quality (0-100, ignored for PNG and video)

parameters.description: JPG/WebP compression quality (0-100, ignored for PNG and video)

parameters.name: annotation_type

param_schema.description: Annotation type: mask only, bounding box only, or both (ignored for binary and greenscreen)

parameters.description: Annotation type: mask only, bounding box only, or both (ignored for binary and greenscreen)

parameters.name: click_object_ids

param_schema.title: Click Object Ids
param_schema.description: Object labels for clicks as 'person,dog,cat'. Auto-generates if missing or incomplete.

parameters.description: Object labels for clicks as 'person,dog,cat'. Auto-generates if missing or incomplete.

parameters.name: click_coordinates

param_schema.title: Click Coordinates
param_schema.description: Click coordinates as '[x,y],[x,y],...'. Determines number of clicks.

parameters.description: Click coordinates as '[x,y],[x,y],...'. Determines number of clicks.

parameters.name: output_frame_interval

param_schema.title: Output Frame Interval
param_schema.description: Output every Nth frame. 1=all frames, 2=every other, etc.

parameters.description: Output every Nth frame. 1=all frames, 2=every other, etc.
